####################################
Arrange 12 cookies, flat side up, on a baking sheet
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['arrange']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'arrange': []}
####################################
 Top each with a scoop of ice cream, then another cookie, flat side down, pressing slightly to adhere
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['top']
Associated Ingredients: ['ice', 'cream']
Final Associations: {'top': [['ice', 'cream']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Cover and freeze the sandwiches until they are firm, at least 3 hours
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['cover', 'freeze']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cover': [], 'freeze': []}
####################################
 Sandwiches can be made up to 4 days ahead
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['be', 'made']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Wrap each sandwich with plastic wrap and keep frozen
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['wrap', 'wrap', 'keep']
Final Associations: {'wrap': [], '#no-action#': [], 'keep': []}

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]
['preheat']

####################################

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda and salt
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]

####################################
 Cream the butter in the bowl of a stand mixer until it gets lighter in color
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]
['cream']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cream': [['butter']]}
####################################
 (You could also beat the butter by hand
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]

####################################
Drop the dough onto your baking sheets using a 1 1/2-inch (1/2-ounce) ice cream scoop
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]

 Space the cookies about 2 inches apart

['space']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Press down on the dough balls to flatten them to about 3 inches around

####################################

['bake']

####################################
 Get the ice cream oozed out to the edges of the cookies by pressing them together gently
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]

####################################
 Roll the sides of the ice cream sandwiches in the crushed pretzels, making sure the pretzels stick
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]

 Place on the prepared baking sheets lined and freeze until ready to serve, at least a half hour
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['caramel', 'candy']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['pretzel'])]

####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Special equipment: an ice cream makerFor the ice cream: In a medium saucepan set over medium-low heat, combine the cream, 1/2 cup of the granulated sugar, the star anise and vanilla seeds
Ingredients: [Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['anise']), Set(['vanilla', 'bean']), Set(['egg']), Set(['salt']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond']), Set(['cranberry']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['orange', 'zest'])]
['set', 'combine']
Associated Ingredients: ['cream']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['anise']
Final Associations: {'combine': [['sugar'], ['anise']], '#no-action#': [['cream']], 'set': []}
####################################
 Bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally, and remove from the heat
Ingredients: [Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['anise']), Set(['vanilla', 'bean']), Set(['egg']), Set(['salt']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond']), Set(['cranberry']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['orange', 'zest'])]
['simmer', 'remove']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'simmer': [], 'remove': []}
####################################
In a small bowl, combine the eggs, salt and the remaining 1/2 cup granulated sugar, and beat until smooth
Ingredients: [Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['anise']), Set(['vanilla', 'bean']), Set(['egg']), Set(['salt']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond']), Set(['cranberry']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['orange', 'zest'])]
['combine', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], '#no-action#': [], 'combine': [['egg'], ['salt'], ['sugar']]}
####################################
Strain the cream mixture through a fine mesh sieve, and then whisk a third of the cream mixture into the eggs
Ingredients: [Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['anise']), Set(['vanilla', 'bean']), Set(['egg']), Set(['salt']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond']), Set(['cranberry']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['orange', 'zest'])]
['strain', 'sieve', 'whisk']
Associated Ingredients: ['cream']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'strain': [['cream']], '#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['egg']], 'sieve': []}

####################################
 Scoop out the batter using a mini ice cream scoop and roll it into balls
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['applesauce']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dark', 'semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bark'])]
['scoop', 'roll']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': [], 'roll': []}
####################################
 Place the dough balls about an inch apart on a baking sheet lined with wax paper and transfer them to the freezer for 30 minutes to let the dough set up
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['applesauce']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dark', 'semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bark'])]
['place', 'transfer', 'set']

####################################
For the dipping chocolate: While the dough is chilling, melt the chocolate wafers and chocolate-almond bark together in a heavy-bottomed saucepan over low heat, stirring constantly
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['applesauce']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dark', 'semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bark'])]

 Remove the chilled dough balls from the freezer

['remove']

Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['applesauce']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dark', 'semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bark'])]

Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']

####################################
 Returned the dough balls to the wax paper-lined baking sheet and refrigerate until set, about 30 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['applesauce']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dark', 'semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bark'])]

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['sugar'])]

['flatten']

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['sugar'])]

                            How to Make Bittersweet Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['sugar'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat oven to 375 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]

['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Whisk together the flour, salt and baking soda in a bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Place the butter in the bowl of an electric stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment and beat until smooth, about 1 minute
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Add the sugars and continue mixing, scraping down the sides and bottom of the bowl until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes longer
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]

####################################

####################################
Using a small ice cream scoop, spoon the dough onto the prepared baking sheets, leaving at least 2 inches between each cookie, and bake on the middle rack until the cookies are lightly golden brown and still soft in the middle, about 11 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]
['spoon', 'bake']

####################################

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
Bake until just golden at the edges, 12 to 14 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['coconut', 'desiccated']), Set(['quinoa']), Set(['walnut'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Remove from the oven and cool completely on a wire rack
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['coconut', 'desiccated']), Set(['quinoa']), Set(['walnut'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Whisk the flour, cornstarch, salt, baking powder and baking soda in a large bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
Beat the butter, brown sugar and granulated sugar in a bowl with a mixer on medium speed until combined but still slightly lumpy (use the paddle attachment for a stand mixer)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat', 'use']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']

Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter'], ['brown', 'sugar'], ['sugar']], 'use': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 The biggest lumps should be about the size of small peas; do not overbeat
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['be', 'overbeat', 'do']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in the eggs one at a time

####################################
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F

####################################
 Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Drop 2 1/2-inch scoops of dough onto the prepared baking sheets, about 2 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until the cookies are barely golden around the edges, about 20 minutes, rotating the baking sheets halfway through
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Turn off the oven but keep the cookies inside for 5 more minutes to set
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['turn', 'keep', 'set']
Final Associations: {'turn': [], '#no-action#': [], 'set': [], 'keep': []}
####################################
 Remove the cookies from the oven and let cool 10 minutes on the baking sheets, then transfer to a rack to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['cornstarch']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            1
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['agave', 'nectar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F

['preheat']

####################################
 Combine the oats, flour, baking soda and salt in a food processor and pulse until the oats are finely ground
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['agave', 'nectar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

 For each cookie, drop 1 rounded tablespoonful of dough onto sheet, spacing 1 inch apart (do not flatten dough)
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

['put', 'pulse', 'transfer']

['press', 'form']

####################################
 If you're making a no-bake pie, bake the crust before adding the filling: Bake at 375 degrees F until the crust is dry, about 10 minutes; the time will vary depending on how crispy the cookies are

['bake', 'bake']

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]

['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Put the flour, baking soda, and salt into a bowl and stir it with a whisk to combine
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['put', 'stir', 'whisk', 'combine']

Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'put': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']], 'combine': [], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': [], 'whisk': []}
####################################
 Set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['set']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
Using a hand or stand mixer, beat the butter until it is lighter in color
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Slowly add in sugars and beat until it is light and fluffy
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the eggs 1 at a time and beat until they are incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stir in the vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['vanilla']]}
####################################
 Add the flour mixture using low speed, then stir in the chocolate chips
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['add', 'stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
 Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until the cookies are lightly browned around the edges, about 12 to 15 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Let the cookies cool for a few minutes and then transfer them to wire racks to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['cool', 'transfer', 'cool']

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

	</div>
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
[]
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Line 2 heavy large baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Finely chop the oats in a food processor
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['chop']
Associated Ingredients: ['oat']
Final Associations: {'chop': [['oat']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Transfer the oats to a medium bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['transfer']
Associated Ingredients: ['oat']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [['oat']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Mix in the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['mix']

####################################
 Set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['set']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
 Using an electric mixer, beat the butter and sugars in a large bowl until fluffy
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']

Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter'], ['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in the eggs and vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']

Final Associations: {'beat': [['egg'], ['vanilla']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the flour mixture and stir just until blended
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################

Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 For each cookie, drop 1 rounded tablespoonful of dough onto sheet, spacing 1-inch apart (do not flatten dough)
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['drop', 'flatten']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': [], 'flatten': []}
####################################
 Bake until the cookies are golden (cookies will flatten slightly), about 15 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake', 'flatten']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': [], 'flatten': []}
####################################
 Cool the cookies on the baking sheets for 5 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Transfer to a cooling rack and cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 (The cookies can be prepared 1 day ahead
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['be']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}

 Store airtight at room temperature
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['toffee']), Set(['hazelnut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line a 14-inch, light colored, round pizza pan with parchment paper and grease the parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['line', 'grease']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': [], 'grease': []}
####################################
In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugars
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['cream']

Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cream': [['cream'], ['butter'], ['sugar']]}
####################################
 Add the eggs, beating well after the addition of each
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
In a bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt and mix with a whisk
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]

####################################
 Add to the butter mixture, mixing to incorporate, and add the vanilla extract
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]

####################################
 Fold in the dark and white chips and the nuts
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['fold']

Final Associations: {'fold': [['nut']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Spread across the bottom of the prepared pan and bake until the edges are golden and the cookie is set but the center is still slightly soft, 20 to 25 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['spread', 'bake', 'set']
Final Associations: {'spread': [], 'set': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['cool', 'transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
To serve, sift confectioners' sugar and sweetened cocoa over the top, and cut into wedges
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]

Final Associations: {'cut': [], 'sift': [['sugar'], ['cocoa']], '#no-action#': [], 'serve': []}
####################################
 Serve sweetened whipped cream on the side
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['serve']
Associated Ingredients: ['cream']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'serve': [['cream']]}

        Recipe courtesy of Emeril Lagasse, 2004

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F; position racks in the upper and lower thirds of the oven
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line two baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Whisk the flour, baking powder, baking soda and fine salt together in a bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['whisk']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'powder']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['flour'], ['baking', 'powder'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']]}
####################################
With an electric mixer, beat the brown sugar, granulated sugar and butter together in a large bowl until light and fluffy, 3 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['brown', 'sugar'], ['sugar'], ['butter']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the vanilla extract and beat to combine
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['add', 'beat', 'combine']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla', 'extract']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['vanilla', 'extract']], '#no-action#': [], 'combine': []}
####################################
 Add the flour mixture and beat until just incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stir in the chocolate chips and caramel bits
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Scoop heaping tablespoons of the dough onto the baking sheets, leaving about 2 inches of space between the cookies (you will have cookie dough left over)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['scoop']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Sprinkle each cookie with a pinch of sea salt
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['sprinkle']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'sprinkle': [['salt']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Bake the cookies until golden brown, rotating the position of the baking sheets halfway through, 13 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Transfer the cookies to a rack to cool
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Meanwhile, cool the baking sheets and repeat with the remaining cookie dough
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['cool', 'repeat']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'repeat': [], 'cool': []}

####################################
 Make the Ice Cream Base: In a saucepan over medium heat, heat the half-and-half, cream, and vanilla, whisking occasionally, to make sure the mixture doesn't burn or stick to the bottom of the pan
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['half-and-half']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'bean']), Set(['egg']), Set(['sugar'])]

####################################
 When the cream mixture reaches a fast simmer (do not let it boil), turn off the heat and let the flavors infuse for 10 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['half-and-half']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'bean']), Set(['egg']), Set(['sugar'])]

 Whisk together the egg yolks and sugar

 In a thin stream, whisk half of the cream mixture into the egg yolk mixture
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['half-and-half']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'bean']), Set(['egg']), Set(['sugar'])]

Ingredients: [Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['cocoa', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
[]
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Whisk the flour, salt and baking soda in a medium bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['whisk']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda']]}
####################################
Beat the butter, vegetable oil, superfine sugar and brown sugar in a bowl with a mixer on medium speed until creamy, about 5 minutes (use the paddle attachment for a stand mixer)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat', 'use']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['vegetable', 'oil']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter'], ['vegetable', 'oil'], ['sugar'], ['brown', 'sugar']], 'use': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 The mixture will look a bit separated at this point
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['look']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in 1 teaspoon water and the vanilla until smooth
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['vanilla']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Reduce the mixer speed to low and beat in the eggs one at a time until just incorporated (do not overbeat)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['reduce', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['egg']], '#no-action#': [], 'reduce': []}
####################################
 Beat in the flour mixture until just combined
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['flour']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stir in the chocolate chips by hand
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Drop tablespoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheets, about 3 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until deep golden brown, about 20 minutes, rotating the baking sheets halfway through
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Remove the cookies from the oven and let cool completely on the baking sheets
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['remove', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'remove': [], 'cool': []}
####################################

Directions
        
            Watch how to make this recipe
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['watch', 'make']
Final Associations: {'make': [], '#no-action#': [], 'watch': []}
####################################

        
        
            
            Preheat oven according to the cookie mix package directions
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Prepare the cookie mix according to directions with the addition of a few drops of green food coloring and the mint extract
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['prepare']
Associated Ingredients: ['mint']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'prepare': [['mint']]}
####################################
 Adjust deepness of the color to your liking, 3 drops is enough to make it a medium color green
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['adjust', 'make']
Final Associations: {'make': [], '#no-action#': [], 'adjust': []}
####################################
  Scoop heaping tablespoons of the cookie batter between 2 cookie sheets, you should get about 2 dozen scoops
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['scoop']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake cookies until just lightly golden at the edges, remove and cool slightly
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['bake', 'remove', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': [], 'remove': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Serve with peppermint stick or mint chocolate chip ice cream
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['serve']
Associated Ingredients: ['mint']
Associated Ingredients: ['ice', 'cream']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'serve': [['mint'], ['ice', 'cream']]}
####################################
 For a fun, tasty and minty ice cream sammy, place small scoops of ice cream between 2  cookies
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['place']
Associated Ingredients: ['ice', 'cream']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [['ice', 'cream']], 'place': []}
####################################
 Push the ice cream to the edge and coat in mini dark chocolate chips or chocolate shavings
Ingredients: [Set(['butter', 'egg', 'cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['vegetable']), Set(['mint']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
['push']
Associated Ingredients: ['ice', 'cream']

####################################

['place']

####################################

Directions
        
        
            
            Line heavy large baking sheets with parchment paper and set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['line', 'set']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
 Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Finely chop the oats in a food processor
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['chop']
Associated Ingredients: ['oat']
Final Associations: {'chop': [['oat']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Mix in the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['mix']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']

Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'mix': [['flour'], ['baking', 'powder'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['set']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
Using an electric mixer, beat the butter and sugars in a large bowl until fluffy
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]

####################################
 Add the flour mixture in 3 parts and stir just until blended

####################################
For each cookie, drop 1 rounded tablespoonful of dough onto the prepared baking sheets, spacing 1-inch apart (do not flatten dough)
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['drop', 'flatten']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': [], 'flatten': []}

 Bake until the cookies are golden (cookies will flatten slightly), about 13 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]
['bake', 'flatten']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': [], 'flatten': []}
####################################
 Cool the cookies on the baking sheets for 5 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['oat']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['almond', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['almond']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['amaretto'])]

In a large bowl, mix together the flour, baking soda, and salt; set aside

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa', 'powder']), Set(['chipotle', 'pepper']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['water']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate'])]

            When measuring flour, we spoon it into a dry measuring cup and level off excess

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat oven to 325 degrees

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
In a large bowl, mix sugars until well combined
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]

 Melt butter in the microwave and add to sugar mixture

['stir']

####################################
 Add vanilla and eggs and stir until well mixed
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]

####################################
 In a separate bowl sift together flour, baking soda, and salt
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]

####################################
 Add dry ingredients to the wet and stir until just combined and NO MORE! The dough will be stiff
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['add', 'stir']
Final Associations: {'add': [], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}

 Drop dough onto sheets with a small ice cream scoop
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]

 Flatten the dough slightly with your hand and bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges and tops of cookies are just turning brown
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]

Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]

Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
[]

####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
To a stand mixer, add the butter, brown sugar and granulated sugar
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'add': [['butter'], ['brown', 'sugar'], ['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Blend on high with the paddle attachment until the sugar granules are less visible and the mixture is light and fluffy, about 4 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['blend']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'blend': [['sugar']]}
####################################
Scrape the sides with a rubber spatula, then add the egg and blend on low until combined, stopping to scrape the sides more to incorporate
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scrape', 'add', 'blend', 'scrape']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': [], 'blend': [], 'scrape': []}
####################################
Prepare the dry ingredients
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]

####################################
 Stir and toss with a spoon or fork
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['stir', 'toss']
Final Associations: {'toss': [], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}
####################################
Scrape the sides of the mixer bowl and, while off, add half of the flour mixture
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scrape', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': [], 'scrape': []}
####################################
 Turn on low and mix until combined; this should only take 5 to 6 rotations of the paddle
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['turn']
Final Associations: {'turn': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stop and scrape the sides again, then add the other half of the flour and mix on low the same way
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scrape', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': [], 'scrape': []}
####################################
 Turn off the mixer

['turn']
Final Associations: {'turn': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################

 Turn the mixer back on low and blend until just combined; this should only take 3 to 4 rotations of the paddle
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['turn', 'blend']
Final Associations: {'turn': [], '#no-action#': [], 'blend': []}
####################################
Line 3 baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Scoop dough balls the size of golf balls, 1 tablespoon each, and place 3 inches apart on the baking sheet, about 8 cookies per sheet
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scoop']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until the edges are set and the center is cooked through, but still soft, 13 to 15 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['bake', 'set']
Final Associations: {'set': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
Cool the cookies for 2 to 3 minutes on the sheets
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Then, holding the baking sheet over a wire cooling rack, remove the cookies from the sheet by gripping the baking sheet with one hand and the parchment paper on the opposite side with your other hand
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['remove']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'remove': []}
####################################
 Gently slide the parchment paper off the sheet with the cookies still on top, resting the parchment and cookies on the wire rack beneath until cool
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['slide', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'slide': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 This cookie removal/cooling trick takes coordination, so think about it before you do it and easy on the egg nog
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['do', 'removal/cooling', 'take', 'think']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [['egg']]}
####################################

        
    
    
    
    






    
    
        Recipe courtesy of Sunny Anderson

                Chocolate Icing:
            
            In a large bowl, place the chocolate and set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['mini-marshmallow']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['corn', 'syrup'])]

In a small saucepan, whisk together the cream and corn syrup and bring to a boil
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['mini-marshmallow']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['corn', 'syrup'])]

####################################
 Pour the cream mixture into the bowl of chocolate and immediately whisk together until smooth
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['mini-marshmallow']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['corn', 'syrup'])]

Yield: about 4 cups
        
    
    
    
    






    
    
        Recipe courtesy of Emeril Lagasse, 2001

Reduce the mixer speed to low; add the flour mixture in 2 additions, scraping down the bowl as needed, until just combined
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['chile', 'ancho']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['bacon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F

####################################
 Line a mini cupcake or muffin pans with 36 mini cupcake liners (or regular size cupcake or muffin pans with 24 cupcake liners)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['milk']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dough', 'cookie']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['butter']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['condensed', 'milk']), Set(['butter']), Set(['cheese', 'cream']), Set(['powdered', 'sugar']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract'])]

####################################
Fill 36 mini cupcake liners three-quarters full with batter and bake until baked through, about 15 minutes (or fill 24 regular cupcake liners three-quarters full with batter and bake for 24 minutes)

['refrigerate']
Final Associations: {'refrigerate': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Roll the dough into 1/2-inch balls
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['milk']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dough', 'cookie']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['butter']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['condensed', 'milk']), Set(['butter']), Set(['cheese', 'cream']), Set(['powdered', 'sugar']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract'])]
['roll']
Associated Ingredients: ['dough']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'roll': [['dough']]}
####################################
 Place on a greased cookie sheet and bake 6 to 10 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['milk']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['dough', 'cookie']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['vanilla']), Set(['cookie', 'chocolate']), Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['butter']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['condensed', 'milk']), Set(['butter']), Set(['cheese', 'cream']), Set(['powdered', 'sugar']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['egg']), Set(['extract', 'maple']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['orange']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['oat']), Set(['pecan'])]
['preheat']

####################################
Melt butter, sugar, and brown sugar together in a microwave for 15 to 30 seconds on medium to low power, careful not to burn the butter
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['egg']), Set(['extract', 'maple']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['orange']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['oat']), Set(['pecan'])]
['melt', 'burn']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Final Associations: {'burn': [], '#no-action#': [], 'melt': [['butter'], ['sugar'], ['brown', 'sugar']]}
####################################
  Let the butter-sugar mixture cool just a bit and blend in the egg and egg yolk
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['egg']), Set(['extract', 'maple']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['orange']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['oat']), Set(['pecan'])]

Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'blend': [['egg'], ['egg']], 'cool': []}

Directions
        
        
            
            Position oven racks in the top and bottom thirds of the oven, and preheat to 375 degrees F

['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line 2 baking sheets with parchment
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Whisk together the flour, baking soda and salt in a large bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Beat the butter, sugar and corn syrup with an electric mixer on medium-high speed in a second large bowl until light and fluffy, about 4 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
