####################################
 Add the eggs to the butter mixture, one at time, beating after each addition to incorporate; beat in the vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['add', 'beat']

 Reduce the speed to medium, add the flour mixture, and beat until just incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

['stir']

Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Scoop 12 heaping tablespoons of dough onto each prepared baking sheet about 2 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['scoop']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Roll each into a ball with slightly wet hands
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['roll']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'roll': []}
####################################
 Bake until the cookies are golden and crunchy on the outside, and chewy on the inside, 10 to 12 minutes, rotating the baking sheets halfway through
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Let the cookies cool for a few minutes on the baking sheets, then transfer them to a rack to cool completely

####################################
When the baking sheets have cooled completely, scoop the remaining dough onto 1 sheet and bake
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['scoop', 'bake']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['corn', 'syrup']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

Combine the butter, sugar and brown sugar in a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['combine']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'combine': [['butter'], ['sugar'], ['brown', 'sugar']]}
####################################
 Mix until well combined and creamy
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['mix']
Final Associations: {'mix': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the vanilla and egg
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add']

####################################
 Gradually add the baking mix and mix until combined
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'mix']
Final Associations: {'add': [['baking', 'mix']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the chocolate chips and pecans; mix until just combined
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'add': [['chocolate']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Drop heaping tablespoons of the dough onto parchment-lined baking sheets
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Bake until the cookies are lightly browned, about 15 minutes, rotating the baking sheets halfway through
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
Remove from the oven and let the cookies cool on the baking sheets for 2 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['remove', 'cool', 'transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'remove': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Store in an airtight container
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['mix', 'baking']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['store']

Directions
        
            Watch how to make this recipe

['watch', 'make']

####################################

        
        
            
            Heat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]
['heat']
Final Associations: {'heat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Spray cookie sheets with nonstick spray or line them with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]
['spray', 'line']

Final Associations: {'spray': [['spray']], '#no-action#': [], 'line': []}
####################################
 Using a mixer, beat the butter until smooth
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in the white and brown sugars, a little at a time, until the mixture is light and fluffy
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in the eggs 1 at a time, then mix in the vanilla and pumpkin puree
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]

####################################
 In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, and cloves
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]
['whisk']

Associated Ingredients: ['salt']

Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt'], ['cinnamon'], ['ginger'], ['nutmeg'], ['clove']]}
####################################
 Slowly beat the flour mixture into the batter in thirds
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]

####################################
 Stir in the chips

['stir']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}
####################################
 Scoop the cookie dough by heaping tablespoons onto the prepared cookie sheets and bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the cookies are browned around the edges
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]
['scoop', 'bake']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Remove the cookie sheets from the oven and let them rest for 2 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]
['remove']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'remove': []}
####################################
 Take the cookies off with a spatula and cool them on wire racks
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['pumpkin']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['ginger']), Set(['nutmeg']), Set(['clove']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['spray', 'cooking'])]

####################################
Using a small ice cream scoop, spoon the dough onto the prepared baking sheets, leaving at least 2 inches between each cookie, and bake on the middle rack until the cookies are lightly golden brown and still soft in the middle, about 11 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]
['spoon', 'bake']
Final Associations: {'spoon': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Let the cookies rest for 2 minutes on the baking sheets before removing them to a baking rack with a wide metal spatula
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]
['removing', 'let', 'rest']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Let the cookies cool on the baking rack for a few minutes before eating
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]
['cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Repeat with the remaining dough
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate'])]
['repeat']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'repeat': []}
####################################

        
    
    
    
    






    
    
        Recipe courtesy of Bobby Flay

 Bake, rotating the cookie sheets from upper to lower racks halfway through, until golden but still soft in the center, 12 to 15 minutes (the longer the cook time, the crunchier the cookies)

Final Associations: {'make': [], '#no-action#': [], 'watch': []}
####################################

        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

 Line two baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, salt and baking soda, then set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

####################################
In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, cream the butter with the brown sugar and granulated sugar on medium speed until light and fluffy, 3 to 5 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['cream']

Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cream': [['cream'], ['butter'], ['brown', 'sugar'], ['sugar']]}
####################################
 Add 2 teaspoons of the vanilla extract and the eggs and blend until incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['add', 'blend']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla', 'extract']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['vanilla', 'extract'], ['egg']], '#no-action#': [], 'blend': []}
####################################
 Lower the speed to a stir, add the flour and mix until just combined
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['lower', 'stir', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'lower': [], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': [], 'add': [['flour']]}
####################################
 Then stir in 2 cups of the chocolate chips until incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Drop the dough in teaspoon-size balls 2-inches apart onto the prepared baking sheets
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until the cookies are golden and crisp, 12 to 15 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Cool the cookies for 5 minutes in the pan and then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]
['cool', 'transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
Whip the heavy cream, confectioners' sugar and the remaining 1 tablespoon vanilla until medium peaks form
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

####################################
 Place about 1/4 cup of the whipped cream in a 9-inch circle on a cake plate and then cover the whipped cream with some cookies
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

 Layer 1 cup whipped cream over the cookies and arrange another layer of cookies over the top
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

####################################
 Repeat the layers three more times, finishing with a layer of cream
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

####################################
 Sprinkle the remaining 1/2 cup chocolate chips over the top
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

####################################
 Refrigerate the cake until the cookies soften, at least 4 hours or up to overnight
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

Final Associations: {'refrigerate': [], '#no-action#': [], 'soften': []}
####################################
Slice into wedges to serve
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['sugar'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line a 14-inch, light colored, round pizza pan with parchment paper and grease the parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['line', 'grease']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': [], 'grease': []}
####################################
In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugars
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['cream']

Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cream': [['cream'], ['butter'], ['sugar']]}
####################################
 Add the eggs, beating well after the addition of each
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
In a bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt and mix with a whisk
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['combine', 'whisk']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']

Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'combine': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']], 'whisk': []}
####################################
 Add to the butter mixture, mixing to incorporate, and add the vanilla extract
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['add', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla', 'extract']
Final Associations: {'add': [['vanilla', 'extract']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Fold in the dark and white chips and the nuts
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['fold']
Associated Ingredients: ['nut']
Final Associations: {'fold': [['nut']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Spread across the bottom of the prepared pan and bake until the edges are golden and the cookie is set but the center is still slightly soft, 20 to 25 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['spread', 'bake', 'set']
Final Associations: {'spread': [], 'set': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['cool', 'transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
To serve, sift confectioners' sugar and sweetened cocoa over the top, and cut into wedges
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]

Final Associations: {'cut': [], 'sift': [['sugar'], ['cocoa']], '#no-action#': [], 'serve': []}
####################################
 Serve sweetened whipped cream on the side
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['white', 'chocolate']), Set(['nut', 'macadamia']), Set(['walnut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['cocoa']), Set(['cream'])]
['serve']

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Whisk the flour, oats, flaxseed, baking soda, salt and cinnamon in a bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['whisk']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['oat']
Associated Ingredients: ['flaxseed']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Associated Ingredients: ['cinnamon']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['flour'], ['oat'], ['flaxseed'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt'], ['cinnamon']]}
####################################
Beat the butter, granulated sugar and brown sugar in a large bowl with a mixer on medium-high speed until fluffy, about 4 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter'], ['sugar'], ['brown', 'sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in the vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['vanilla']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Reduce the mixer speed to low; add the flour mixture and beat until just combined, scraping down the bowl as needed
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['reduce', 'add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': [], 'reduce': []}
####################################
 Stir in the chocolate chips
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheets, about 2 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Let the cookies cool 3 minutes on the baking sheets, then transfer to racks to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['flaxseed']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['cool', 'transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F; position racks in the upper and lower thirds of the oven
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line two baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Whisk the flour, baking powder, baking soda and fine salt together in a bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['whisk']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'powder']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['flour'], ['baking', 'powder'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']]}
####################################
With an electric mixer, beat the brown sugar, granulated sugar and butter together in a large bowl until light and fluffy, 3 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['brown', 'sugar'], ['sugar'], ['butter']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the vanilla extract and beat to combine
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]

Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla', 'extract']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['vanilla', 'extract']], '#no-action#': [], 'combine': []}
####################################
 Add the flour mixture and beat until just incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stir in the chocolate chips and caramel bits
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Scoop heaping tablespoons of the dough onto the baking sheets, leaving about 2 inches of space between the cookies (you will have cookie dough left over)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['scoop']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Sprinkle each cookie with a pinch of sea salt
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['sprinkle']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'sprinkle': [['salt']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Bake the cookies until golden brown, rotating the position of the baking sheets halfway through, 13 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Transfer the cookies to a rack to cool
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Meanwhile, cool the baking sheets and repeat with the remaining cookie dough
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semi-sweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['bit', 'caramel', 'candy']), Set(['salt'])]
['cool', 'repeat']

Directions
        
        
            
            Place an oven rack in the center of the oven

####################################
 To form the cookies, scoop about 1/4 cup of cookie dough into your hands and roll it around into a ball; place them about 3-inches apart onto the prepared cookie sheets; you should get about 4 cookies on each pan
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Press down the tops of the dough slightly and bake until the cookies are light brown, 12 minutes for chewy cookies, or about 15 minutes for crispy cookies
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate'])]

Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]

####################################
In a separate bowl, stir together the flour, baking soda, instant coffee and salt
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]

Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['coffee']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['coffee'], ['salt']]}
####################################
 Add to the wet ingredients in three batches, mixing gently after each addition
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['add']
Final Associations: {'add': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stir in the chocolate chips, flax seed and millet
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['stir']

Associated Ingredients: ['millet']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate'], ['flax', 'seed'], ['millet']]}
####################################
Drop balls of dough on a cookie sheet and bake for 11 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['drop', 'bake']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Remove from the cookie sheet and allow to cool
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['remove', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'remove': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
Using a kitchen scoop, take one scoop of ice cream and place it onto the flat side of a cookie, then top with second cookie, pressing to allow the ice cream to spread slightly
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['place', 'spread']
Associated Ingredients: ['ice', 'cream']
Final Associations: {'spread': [], '#no-action#': [['ice', 'cream']], 'place': []}
####################################
 Immediately roll the edges of the cookie in chocolate chips or candies so that the ice cream is coated
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['roll']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Associated Ingredients: ['ice', 'cream']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'roll': [['chocolate'], ['ice', 'cream']]}
####################################
 Wrap individually in plastic and freeze until the ice cream is very firm, at least 4 hours
Ingredients: [Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['margarine']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['coffee']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['seed', 'flax']), Set(['millet']), Set(['ice', 'cream']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['wrap', 'freeze']
Associated Ingredients: ['ice', 'cream']
Final Associations: {'wrap': [], '#no-action#': [], 'freeze': [['ice', 'cream']]}

Directions
        
        
            
            For the dough: Put the flour, baking soda, and salt into a bowl and stir it with a whisk to combine
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['put', 'stir', 'whisk', 'combine']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'put': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']], 'combine': [], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': [], 'whisk': []}
####################################
 Set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['set']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
 Using a hand or stand mixer, beat the butter until it is lighter in color
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Slowly add in sugars and beat until it is light and fluffy
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the eggs 1 at a time and beat until they are incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stir in the vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['vanilla']]}
####################################
 Add the flour mixture using the low speed, then stir in the chocolate chips
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['add', 'stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
 Set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['set']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
To form the cookies: Use 2 teaspoons of the dough and roll it into balls
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['form', 'use', 'roll']
Final Associations: {'use': [], '#no-action#': [], 'roll': [], 'form': []}
####################################
 Put the balls onto a cookie sheet
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['put']
Final Associations: {'put': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 When they are all made, put them into the freezer for about 30 minutes to firm up
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['put']
Final Associations: {'put': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
For the batter: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, and baking powder
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['whisk']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['powder', 'baking']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['flour'], ['sugar'], ['powder', 'baking']]}
####################################
 Add the egg and half the seltzer and whisk well to combine
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['add', 'whisk', 'combine']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': [], 'combine': [], 'whisk': []}
####################################
 Add more seltzer as needed until the batter is thick and the consistency of heavy cream
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['add']
Final Associations: {'add': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
To make the cookies: Heat the oil in a deep-fat fryer to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['make', 'heat']
Associated Ingredients: ['oil']
Final Associations: {'make': [], '#no-action#': [], 'heat': [['oil']]}
####################################
Dip the chilled dough balls in the batter and carefully place them into the hot oil
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['dip', 'place']
Associated Ingredients: ['oil']
Final Associations: {'place': [['oil']], '#no-action#': [], 'dip': []}
####################################
 Fry a few at a time, turning them over from time to time, until they are golden brown, about 3 minutes total
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['fry']
Final Associations: {'fry': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Drain on paper towels and serve while still warm
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['egg']), Set(['water', 'soda']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil'])]
['drain', 'serve']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'serve': [], 'drain': []}

Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['bean', 'cannellini']), Set(['syrup', 'maple']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################

 Beat the butter and both sugars with an electric mixer on medium-high speed in a second large bowl until light and fluffy, about 4 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Drop scant tablespoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheets, about 2 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until golden brown around the edges but still light in the center, about 8 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Soak the pitted dates in 1/4 cup hot water for 5 minutes; reserve the water
Ingredients: [Set(['date']), Set(['almond']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['oat']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['soak']
Associated Ingredients: ['date']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'soak': [['date']]}
####################################
In a food processor, combine the almonds, coconut flakes, oats and salt
Ingredients: [Set(['date']), Set(['almond']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['oat']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['combine']
Associated Ingredients: ['almond']
Associated Ingredients: ['coconut']
Associated Ingredients: ['oat']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'combine': [['almond'], ['coconut'], ['oat']]}
####################################
 Pulse until a fine meal forms
Ingredients: [Set(['date']), Set(['almond']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['oat']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['pulse']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'pulse': []}
####################################
 Add the peanut butter, soaked dates, 3 tablespoons of the reserved soaking water and the vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['date']), Set(['almond']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['oat']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['peanut', 'butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['date']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Final Associations: {'add': [['peanut', 'butter'], ['date'], ['vanilla']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Process until the mixture forms a cookie-dough consistency
Ingredients: [Set(['date']), Set(['almond']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['oat']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate'])]
['form']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Transfer the mixture to a bowl, then fold in the chocolate chips
Ingredients: [Set(['date']), Set(['almond']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['oat']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate'])]

['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}

Directions
        
            Watch how to make this recipe

####################################

        
        
            
            Special equipment: Eight 3-inch cast-iron skilletsPreheat the oven to 375 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['oat']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['yogurt', 'milk']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['dark', 'chocolate']), Set(['cherry']), Set(['ice', 'cream'])]
[]

Combine the flour, oats, baking soda and salt in a large bowl and set aside

####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
In a large bowl, mix sugars until well combined
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['mix']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'mix': [['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Melt butter in the microwave and add to sugar mixture
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['melt', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'add': [['sugar']], '#no-action#': [], 'melt': [['butter']]}
####################################
 Stir until well combined
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['stir']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}
####################################
 Add vanilla and eggs and stir until well mixed
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['add', 'stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['vanilla'], ['egg']], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}
####################################
 In a separate bowl sift together flour, baking soda, and salt
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['sift']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'soda']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'sift': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add dry ingredients to the wet and stir until just combined and NO MORE! The dough will be stiff
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['add', 'stir']
Final Associations: {'add': [], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}
####################################
 Add chocolate chips and nuts
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'add': [['chocolate']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stir until just combined
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['stir']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}
####################################
 Avoid any extra stirring to avoid tough cookies
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['avoid']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line cookie sheets with parchment or waxed paper
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Drop dough onto sheets with a small ice cream scoop
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Flatten the dough slightly with your hand and bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges and tops of cookies are just turning brown
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['flatten', 'bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': [], 'flatten': []}
####################################
 Cool on wire racks
Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
['cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}

Ingredients: [Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['butter']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['milk', 'chocolate']), Set(['walnut'])]
[]

####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
To a stand mixer, add the butter, brown sugar and granulated sugar
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'add': [['butter'], ['brown', 'sugar'], ['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Blend on high with the paddle attachment until the sugar granules are less visible and the mixture is light and fluffy, about 4 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['blend']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'blend': [['sugar']]}
####################################
Scrape the sides with a rubber spatula, then add the egg and blend on low until combined, stopping to scrape the sides more to incorporate
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scrape', 'add', 'blend', 'scrape']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': [], 'blend': [], 'scrape': []}
####################################
Prepare the dry ingredients
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['prepare']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'prepare': []}
####################################
 In a separate bowl, add the flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking powder and baking soda
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]

Associated Ingredients: ['flour']

####################################
 Stir and toss with a spoon or fork
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['stir', 'toss']
Final Associations: {'toss': [], '#no-action#': [], 'stir': []}
####################################
Scrape the sides of the mixer bowl and, while off, add half of the flour mixture
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scrape', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': [], 'scrape': []}
####################################
 Turn on low and mix until combined; this should only take 5 to 6 rotations of the paddle
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['turn']
Final Associations: {'turn': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Stop and scrape the sides again, then add the other half of the flour and mix on low the same way
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scrape', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': [], 'scrape': []}
####################################
 Turn off the mixer
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['turn']
Final Associations: {'turn': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Add the chopped chocolate chips and crushed candy canes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Associated Ingredients: ['crushed', 'candy']
Final Associations: {'add': [['chocolate'], ['crushed', 'candy']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Turn the mixer back on low and blend until just combined; this should only take 3 to 4 rotations of the paddle
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['turn', 'blend']
Final Associations: {'turn': [], '#no-action#': [], 'blend': []}
####################################
Line 3 baking sheets with parchment paper
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Scoop dough balls the size of golf balls, 1 tablespoon each, and place 3 inches apart on the baking sheet, about 8 cookies per sheet
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['scoop']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Bake until the edges are set and the center is cooked through, but still soft, 13 to 15 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['bake', 'set']
Final Associations: {'set': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
Cool the cookies for 2 to 3 minutes on the sheets
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Then, holding the baking sheet over a wire cooling rack, remove the cookies from the sheet by gripping the baking sheet with one hand and the parchment paper on the opposite side with your other hand
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['remove']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'remove': []}
####################################
 Gently slide the parchment paper off the sheet with the cookies still on top, resting the parchment and cookies on the wire rack beneath until cool
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['slide', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'slide': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 This cookie removal/cooling trick takes coordination, so think about it before you do it and easy on the egg nog
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['flour']), Set(['spice', 'pie', 'pumpkin']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['cane', 'crushed', 'candy', 'green', 'coarsely', 'red'])]
['do', 'removal/cooling', 'take', 'think']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [['egg']]}

####################################
 Bake until golden, 12 to 14 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['chile', 'ancho']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['bacon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Let the cookies cool 2 minutes on the baking sheets, then transfer to a rack to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['chile', 'ancho']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['bacon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['cool', 'transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 Store in an airtight container for up to 3 days
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['cinnamon']), Set(['chile', 'ancho']), Set(['kosher', 'salt']), Set(['bacon']), Set(['butter']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['store']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'store': []}

Directions
        
        
            
            Position oven racks in the top and bottom thirds of the oven, and preheat to 375 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line 2 baking sheets with parchment
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Whisk together the flour, baking soda and salt in a large bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['whisk']

Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'whisk': [['flour'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']]}
####################################
 Beat the coconut oil and both sugars with an electric mixer on medium-high speed in a second large bowl until light and fluffy, about 4 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['coconut', 'oil']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['coconut', 'oil'], ['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the eggs to the coconut oil mixture, one at time, beating after each addition to incorporate; beat in the vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']

Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['vanilla']], 'add': [['egg'], ['coconut', 'oil']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Reduce the speed to medium, add the flour mixture, and beat until just incorporated
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['reduce', 'add', 'beat']
