####################################
 Stir in the chocolate chips
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Scoop 12 heaping tablespoons of dough onto each prepared baking sheet about 2 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['scoop']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Roll each into a ball with slightly wet hands
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['roll']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'roll': []}
####################################
 Bake until the cookies are golden but still soft in the center, 12 to 15 minutes, rotating the baking sheets halfway through
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Let the cookies cool for a few minutes on the baking sheets, then transfer them to a rack to cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['cool', 'transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
When the baking sheets have cooled completely, scoop the remaining dough onto 1 sheet and bake
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['scoop', 'bake']
Final Associations: {'scoop': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Store the cookies in a tightly sealed container at room temperature for up to 5 days
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['coconut', 'oil']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['store']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'store': []}

                Edible Cookie  Dough:

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F

            Preheat oven to 350 degrees F

 Add the baking soda, vanilla and salt to the butter mixture, mixing just until combined

####################################

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['espresso', 'instant']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
In a large mixing bowl, combine cold butter, dark brown sugar, light brown sugar, granulated sugar and espresso with a hand mixer
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['espresso', 'instant']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate'])]
['combine']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['espresso']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'combine': [['butter'], ['brown', 'sugar'], ['brown', 'sugar'], ['sugar'], ['espresso']]}
####################################
 Mix at slow speed for 30 seconds and increase speed until the mixture is fluffy, about 6 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['espresso', 'instant']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate'])]
['mix']
Final Associations: {'mix': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Lower the speed and add the eggs 1 at a time
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['espresso', 'instant']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate'])]
['lower', 'add']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'lower': [], '#no-action#': [], 'add': [['egg']]}
####################################
 Add vanilla and mix until all ingredients are incorporated

Scoop 12 heaping tablespoons of dough onto each prepared baking sheet about 2 inches apart

####################################
 Alternate folding the flour mixture and the milk into the batter with a spatula, adding the flour in three additions and the milk in two, starting and ending with the flour, until just smooth
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['milk']), Set(['sprinkle']), Set(['cheese', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract'])]

####################################
 (The cake batter will be on the thin side, like a thick pancake batter
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['milk']), Set(['sprinkle']), Set(['cheese', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract'])]

####################################
)Pour the cake batter over the cookie layer, and bake until the middle of the cake springs back when pressed and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean, 1 hour to 1 hour 10 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['milk']), Set(['sprinkle']), Set(['cheese', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract'])]

Ingredients: [Set(['butter']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate']), Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['vegetable', 'oil']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['milk']), Set(['sprinkle']), Set(['cheese', 'cream']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract'])]

For the frosting: Beat the cream cheese and granulated sugar with an electric mixer on medium-high speed in a large bowl until smooth and all the sugar has dissolved (rub some between your fingers; if it's gritty, keep beating)

                Yogurt Cheese:

['discard']
Final Associations: {'discard': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Yield: about 1 1/2 to 1 3/4 cups
        
            
                Sugar Substitute Brown Sugar:
            
            Mix together the syrup and sugar substitute
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['yogurt', 'cheese']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['yogurt']), Set(['cheesecloth']), Set(['syrup', 'maple']), Set(['sugar'])]

####################################

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['yogurt', 'cheese']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['yogurt']), Set(['cheesecloth']), Set(['syrup', 'maple']), Set(['sugar'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Line two baking sheets with parchment paper and set aside

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['cacao', 'chocolate']), Set(['cacao', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
To the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment, add the butter, brown sugar and granulated sugar and cream on medium speed until fluffy and light in color, about 4 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['cacao', 'chocolate']), Set(['cacao', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
While mixing, add the eggs, one at a time, scraping the bowl after each addition and mixing until combined
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['salt']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['cacao', 'chocolate']), Set(['cacao', 'chocolate'])]

 Using a wooden spoon, stir in the oats, chocolate chips, coconut, pecans and dried fruit until incorporated

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['allspice']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['oat']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['pecan']), Set(['papaya', 'fruit', 'pineapple', 'mango'])]

Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['allspice']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['oat']), Set(['chocolate']), Set(['coconut']), Set(['pecan']), Set(['papaya', 'fruit', 'pineapple', 'mango'])]

            Combine the flours, wheat germ, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['combine']

Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'combine': [['flour'], ['wheat', 'germ'], ['baking', 'soda'], ['salt']]}
####################################
 In a large bowl, beat the butter and sugars with a mixer at medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat']

Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['butter'], ['sugar']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Beat in the eggs, one at a time, until well blended, then beat in the vanilla
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['beat', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Final Associations: {'beat': [['vanilla']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
At low speed, add the flour mixture in batches until just combined
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['flour']
Final Associations: {'add': [['flour']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Using a wooden spoon, stir in the chocolate chips
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['stir']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'stir': [['chocolate']]}
####################################
Position the racks in the upper and lower thirds of the oven and preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

####################################
 Line baking sheets with parchment paper or silicone mats
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Drop heaping tablespoons of the dough onto the lined baking sheets, leaving about 2 inches of space between them (you should fit about 12 cookies on each baking sheet)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['drop']
Final Associations: {'drop': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Bake until the cookies are slightly golden around the edges, 14 to 15 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
  Let cool for about 3 minutes, then transfer the cookies with a spatula to a wire rack to cool completely (or for as long as you can wait)
Ingredients: [Set(['flour']), Set(['flour']), Set(['wheat', 'germ']), Set(['baking', 'soda']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['semisweet', 'chocolate'])]

Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat oven at 350F
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Line a cookie sheet with aluminum foil
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Place 48 Tostitos Scoops! on cookie sheet
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['place']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'place': []}
####################################
 Cut each cookie dough squares in half to create 48 pieces of dough roll each into small balls and place cookie dough balls in the center of the chip
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['cut', 'roll']
Final Associations: {'cut': [], '#no-action#': [], 'roll': []}
####################################
 Bake 10 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Remove from oven let cool
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['remove', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'remove': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
While cookie chips are cooling, in a microwave Pyrex bowl place bitter sweet chips with 14 cup cream
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['microwave', 'place', 'cream']
Associated Ingredients: ['cream']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'place': [], 'microwave': [], 'cream': [['cream']]}
####################################
 Microwave 1 minute, mix with a spoon until chocolate chips are all melted into a ganache
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['microwave']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate', 'chips']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'microwave': [['chocolate', 'chips']]}
####################################
 Let cool slightly
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['cool']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
 While still warm but not hot, place ganache in a zip lock bag twist bag to form a piping bag snipped the corner of bag to form a very small hole
Ingredients: [Set(['tortilla']), Set(['butter', 'peanut']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['heavy', 'cream']), Set(['peanut']), Set(['cream'])]
['twist', 'form', 'form']

[]
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Sift the flour, baking powder and salt in a medium bowl and set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['sift', 'set']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'powder']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'sift': [['baking', 'powder'], ['salt']], '#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
Cream the butter, granulated sugar and brown sugar in a second medium bowl using a hand mixer on high speed, about 3 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['cream']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cream': [['butter'], ['sugar'], ['brown', 'sugar']]}
####################################
 Add one egg at a time, making sure to mix well before each addition
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add', 'mix']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'mix': [], 'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the vanilla and almond meal and mix
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Associated Ingredients: ['almond']
Final Associations: {'add': [['vanilla'], ['almond']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture and beat until combined

####################################
 The dough will be thick and sticky

####################################

####################################
Transfer the dough to a lightly-floured surface; divide in half
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['transfer', 'divide']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'divide': []}
####################################
 Using floured hands, shape each piece of dough into a log about 10-inches long
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['shape']
Final Associations: {'shape': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Brush off excess flour; transfer the logs to the prepared baking sheet, spaced 5 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['brush', 'transfer']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'brush': []}
####################################
 Flatten each log into a 2-inch-wide strip
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['flatten']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'flatten': []}
####################################
 Bake until browned and set, about 20 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['bake', 'set']
Final Associations: {'set': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Transfer to a rack; let cool for 10 minutes

['transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
Reduce the oven temperature to 300 degrees F

['reduce']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'reduce': []}
####################################
Transfer the biscotti to a work surface
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['transfer']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Using a serrated knife, cut each strip diagonally into 1/3-inch-thick slices
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]

['arrange']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'arrange': []}

['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Transfer the baking sheets to racks and let cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
Biscookies can be made 3 days ahead

	</div>
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
[]
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
Directions
        
        
            
            Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['preheat']
Final Associations: {'preheat': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['line']
Final Associations: {'line': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Sift the flour, baking powder and salt in a medium bowl and set aside
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['sift', 'set']
Associated Ingredients: ['baking', 'powder']
Associated Ingredients: ['salt']
Final Associations: {'sift': [['baking', 'powder'], ['salt']], '#no-action#': [], 'set': []}
####################################
Cream the butter, granulated sugar and brown sugar in a second medium bowl using a hand mixer on high speed, about 3 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['cream']
Associated Ingredients: ['butter']
Associated Ingredients: ['sugar']
Associated Ingredients: ['brown', 'sugar']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'cream': [['butter'], ['sugar'], ['brown', 'sugar']]}
####################################
 Add one egg at a time, making sure to mix well before each addition
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add', 'mix']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'mix': [], 'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Add the vanilla and almond meal and mix
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add']
Associated Ingredients: ['vanilla']
Associated Ingredients: ['almond']
Final Associations: {'add': [['vanilla'], ['almond']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture and beat until combined
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['add', 'beat']
Associated Ingredients: ['egg']
Final Associations: {'beat': [], 'add': [['egg']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 The dough will be thick and sticky
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['be']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Fold in the chocolate chips and pecans
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['fold']
Associated Ingredients: ['chocolate', 'chips']
Associated Ingredients: ['pecan']
Final Associations: {'fold': [['chocolate', 'chips'], ['pecan']], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
Transfer the dough to a lightly-floured surface; divide in half
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['transfer', 'divide']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'divide': []}
####################################
 Using floured hands, shape each piece of dough into a log about 10-inches long
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['shape']
Final Associations: {'shape': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Brush off excess flour; transfer the logs to the prepared baking sheet, spaced 5 inches apart
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['brush', 'transfer']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'brush': []}
####################################
 Flatten each log into a 2-inch-wide strip
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['flatten']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'flatten': []}
####################################
 Bake until browned and set, about 20 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['bake', 'set']
Final Associations: {'set': [], '#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Transfer to a rack; let cool for 10 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
Reduce the oven temperature to 300 degrees F
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['reduce']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'reduce': []}
####################################
Transfer the biscotti to a work surface
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['transfer']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Using a serrated knife, cut each strip diagonally into 1/3-inch-thick slices
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['cut']
Final Associations: {'cut': [], '#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Arrange the slices cut-side down on baking sheets
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['arrange']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'arrange': []}
####################################
 Bake the biscotti, rotating the baking sheets halfway through, until crisp, about 30 minutes
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['bake']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': [], 'bake': []}
####################################
 Transfer the baking sheets to racks and let cool completely
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['transfer', 'cool']
Final Associations: {'transfer': [], '#no-action#': [], 'cool': []}
####################################
Biscookies can be made 3 days ahead
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
['be', 'made']
Final Associations: {'#no-action#': []}
####################################
 Store in an airtight container at room temperature
Ingredients: [Set(['flour', 'wheat', 'pastry']), Set(['baking', 'powder']), Set(['salt']), Set(['butter']), Set(['sugar']), Set(['brown', 'sugar']), Set(['egg']), Set(['vanilla', 'extract']), Set(['almond']), Set(['chips', 'chocolate']), Set(['pecan'])]
